WANDER_SPAWNS.name: Wandering Hordes
WANDER_SPAWNS.description: If true, emulates zombie hordes. Zombies can group together into hordes, which can wander around cities and will sometimes move towards noise. Note: This feature is still in development, but should be mostly bug-free.

NPC_SPAWNTIME.name: NPC Spawn Rate
NPC_SPAWNTIME.description: Baseline average number of days between random NPC spawns. Average duration goes up with the number of NPCs already spawned. A higher number means fewer NPCs. Set to 0 days to disable random NPCs.

SPAWN_DENSITY.name: Monster Spawn Density
SPAWN_DENSITY.description: A scaling factor that determines density of monster spawns. A higher number means more monsters.

BLACK_ROAD.name: Black Road
BLACK_ROAD.description: If true, spawn zombies at shelters. Makes the starting game a lot harder.

EVOLUTION_INVERSE_MULTIPLIER.name: Monster Evolution Scaling
EVOLUTION_INVERSE_MULTIPLIER.description: A multiplier for the time between monster upgrades. For example a value of 2.00 would cause evolution to occur at half speed. Set to 0.00 to turn off monster upgrades.

ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY.name: Eternal Time of Day
ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY.description: Day/night cycle settings. 'Normal' sets a normal cycle. 'Eternal Day' sets eternal day. 'Eternal Night' sets eternal night.

WORLD_END.name: World End Behavior
WORLD_END.description: Handling of game world when last character dies.

CITY_SIZE.name: City Size
CITY_SIZE.description: A number determining how large cities are. A higher number means larger cities. 0 disables cities, roads and any scenario requiring a city start.

ETERNAL_SEASON.name: Eternal Season
ETERNAL_SEASON.description: If true, keep the initial season forever. Warning: currently bugged and may not work properly.

DEFAULT_REGION.name: Default Region
DEFAULT_REGION.description: (WIP feature) Determines terrain, shops, plants, and more.

CITY_SPACING.name: City Spacing
CITY_SPACING.description: A number determining how far apart cities are. Warning, small numbers lead to very slow mapgen.
